events.message: I received my order last week, but the product is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund for it.
The case has been classified as a refund request based on the customer's message about returning the product.
Your case has been assigned to one of our refund specialists who will assist you further.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you’re not satisfied with your purchase. I will help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can proceed quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product does not match the description on the website.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a refund and send you a prepaid label to return the item.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate the refund process and the return label offered.
The refund request has been processed, and the return label was sent to your email. Let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and if the refund was completed to your satisfaction.
Yes, I received the label and returned the product yesterday. The refund was processed quickly, thank you!
We are glad your refund was successful. Closing the case now. Please reach out if you need support in the future.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback about your refund experience. Your input helps us improve.
